title: Obama Presidential Library: Adam Strickler emails (adam_g._strickler@nsc.eop.gov) referencing Yevgeny Prigozhin

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any emails either to or from Adam Strickler's email address (adam_g._strickler@nsc.eop.gov) that mention the Russian oligarch and founder of the Wagner Paramilitary Group, Yevgeny Prigozhin, in the subject line, email body, or in an attachment.

Limit the time from January 20th 2013 to January 20th 2017. 

Search terms:
Yevgeny Prigozhin
Yevgeny Viktorovich Prigozhin
Евгений Пригожин

If certain parts of this request or certain portions must be redacted please provide any reasonable segregable portion of a requested record after removing or redacting those portions claimed to be exempt, explain in writing the justification for redacting the record, indicate the extent of any redactions on the portion of the record which is made available or published and where technically feasible indicate on the redacted portion itself the specific exemption(s) claimed.

Thank you to the commitment to transparency and I look forward to having this request resolved.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Robert Delaware

title: Obama Presidential Library: Eric Ciaramella emails (eric_a_ciaramella@nsc.eop.gov) referencing Yevgeny Prigozhin

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Obama Presidential Library: Eric Ciaramella emails (eric_a_ciaramella@nsc.eop.gov) referencing Yevgeny Prigozhin
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any emails either to or from Eric Ciaramella's Obama-era email address of eric_a_ciaramella@nsc.eop.gov that mention the Russian oligarch and founder of the Wagner Paramilitary Group, Yevgeny Prigozhin, in the subject line, email body, or in an attachment.

From what I understand, Ciaramella used the eric_a_ciaramella@nsc.eop.gov email address from sometime in 2015 until January 20th of 2017. 

Key search terms:
Yevgeny Prigozhin
Yevgeny Viktorovich Prigozhin
Евгений Пригожин (Russian)
Євген Пригожин (Ukrainian)

If certain parts of this request or certain portions must be redacted please provide any reasonable segregable portion of a requested record after removing or redacting those portions claimed to be exempt, explain in writing the justification for redacting the record, indicate the extent of any redactions on the portion of the record which is made available or published and where technically feasible indicate on the redacted portion itself the specific exemption(s) claimed.

Thank you to the commitment to transparency and I look forward to having this request resolved.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Robert Delaware
